languages.text: {n}В последнем, хоть он и прячет лицо под капюшоном, вы опознаете Оптикона-22, встреченного вами на {g|Encyclopedia:Footfall}Футфоле{/g}.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}В последнем, хоть он и прячет лицо под капюшоном, вы опознаете Оптикона-22, встреченного вами на {g|Encyclopedia:Footfall}Футфоле{/g}.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Despite the hood hiding his face, you recognise him as Opticon-22, whom you encountered on {g|Encyclopedia:Footfall}Footfall{/g}.{/n}

languages.text: {n}フードが彼の顔を隠しているにもかかわらず、あなたはそれが{g|Encyclopedia:Footfall}フットフォール{/g}で遭遇したオプティコン-22であると認識していた。{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}フードが彼の顔を隠しているにもかかわらず、あなたはそれが{g|Encyclopedia:Footfall}フットフォール{/g}で遭遇したオプティコン-22であると認識していた。{/n}

languages.text: {n}尽管那个驼背的人头上戴着兜帽，但你依然认了出来。他是奥普蒂孔22号，你曾在{g|Encyclopedia:Footfall}落脚港{/g}见过他。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Despite the hood hiding his face, you recognise him as Opticon-22, whom you encountered on {g|Encyclopedia:Footfall}Footfall{/g}.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}尽管那个驼背的人头上戴着兜帽，但你依然认了出来。他是奥普蒂孔22号，你曾在{g|Encyclopedia:Footfall}落脚港{/g}见过他。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Obwohl eine Kapuze sein Gesicht verbirgt, erkennst du ihn als Opticon-22, den du auf {g|Encyclopedia:Footfall}Footfall{/g} kennengelernt hast.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Despite the hood hiding his face, you recognise him as Opticon-22, whom you encountered on {g|Encyclopedia:Footfall}Footfall{/g}.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Obwohl eine Kapuze sein Gesicht verbirgt, erkennst du ihn als Opticon-22, den du auf {g|Encyclopedia:Footfall}Footfall{/g}kennengelernt hast.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Malgré le capuchon qui dissimule son visage, vous reconnaissez Opticon-22, que vous avez déjà rencontré à {g|Encyclopedia:Footfall}Castel{/g}.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Despite the hood hiding his face, you recognise him as Opticon-22, whom you encountered on {g|Encyclopedia:Footfall}Footfall{/g}.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Malgré le capuchon qui dissimule son visage, vous reconnaissez Opticon-22, que vous avez déjà croisé à {g|Encyclopedia:Footfall}Castel{/g}.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Pese a llevar el rostro oculto bajo una capucha, reconoces a Opticon-22, con quien ya coincidiste en {g|Encyclopedia:Footfall}Paso{/g}.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Despite the hood hiding his face, you recognise him as Opticon-22, whom you encountered on {g|Encyclopedia:Footfall}Footfall{/g}.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Pese a llevar el rostro oculto bajo una capucha, reconoces a Opticon-22, a quien ya conociste en {g|Encyclopedia:Footfall}Paso{/g}.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Yüzünü gizleyen kapüşonuna rağmen onun {g|Encyclopedia:Footfall}Binliman'da{/g} karşılaştığın Opticon-22 olduğunu fark ediyorsun.{/n}
